doc:
Robert F. Lyons (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Lyons_(actor) 0 Robert F. Lyons (born October 17, 1938 in Albany, New York) is an American actor of film and television. He is best known for guest starring in numerous popular television shows since the 1960s and for appearing in such films as Dark Night of the Scarecrow (1981), Death Wish II (1982), Murphy's Law (1986) and Platoon Leader (1988). Robert_F._Lyons ( born October_17_,_1938 in Albany , New_York ) is an_American_actor of film_and_television . He is_best_known for guest starring in numerous_popular_television_shows since the_1960s and for appearing in such_films as Dark_Night of the_Scarecrow ( 1981_) , Death_Wish_II_(_1982_) , Murphy 's_Law ( 1986 ) and Platoon_Leader_(_1988_) .
